r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $678.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Pan American Development Foundation. The average
  contract duration was 3.37 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.2M. The longest
  contract was 6.69 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.5M.
lookup_name: 'PAN AMERICAN DEVELOPMENT FOUNDATION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '678.6K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '50%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '22%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '800.0K'
s424_mean_duration: '3.37'
s421_mean_contract_value: '2.2M'
s425_max_duration: '6.69'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.5M'
